resources.string: Smart Tools is the most useful application for making life easier. Smart Tools is the complete package manager. It has now 5 most needed daily life applications. # Super VPN - 100% free fastest VPN to unblock facebook, twitter, youtube and also to secure your mobile. # Smart Radio - Play online radio with 25000+ stations from all around the worlds. # App Manager - View system and user apps, launch and more. # Keep Notes - Save and track your daily important notes easily. # Learn Words - Learn daily words with pronunciation, translation, synonyms, antonyms and definitions. Solve quiz of synonyms and antonyms from million words.
